articles.title: Byju's To Lay Off 500 Employees Amid Financial Crunch: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Byju's is laying off about 500 employees, including from sales, amid a financial crunch, sources said, even as the troubled edtech firm maintained that it is in the final stages of business restructuring to streamline operations.
articles.content:
Byju's rose to dizzying heights before facing a slew of challenges. (Representational)

articles.title: Bharat Biotech, SII arm Bilthoven Biologicals join hands for global polio eradication - The Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: HYDERABAD: Vaccine maker Bharat Biotech has joined hands with Serum Institute of India’s (SII) wholly-owned Dutch subsidiary Bilthoven Biologicals BV .

articles.title: Why Northern Lights viewing is about to get more magical - BBC.com
articles.description: There are many myths surrounding the aurora but satellite technology provides insights into the celestial marvel.
